title: The MutleyMedia Booth
brief_description: Provides a descriptive run-down of the machinations of the ACMI MutleyMedia Booth through a presentation taken from a walk through that will play on the Booth’s three screens. Two short films - Pneumatic and Chinagirl - embedded in the presentation represent the 16 original works by Australian artists made for screening inside the Booth.
